DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Director-General of UNESCO and His Party
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Director-General of UNESCO and His Party 
   Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, DPRK minister of Foreign Affairs, met and had a talk with Koitsiro Matsuura, director-general of the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO), and his party, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

Choe Thae Bok Meets Mexican Party Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Mexican Party Delegation 
   Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico headed by Reginaldo Sandobal, coordinator of its National Coordinating Committee, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
